attributes.action: protect and preserve the small market town of Wimborne Minster in Dorset by honouring his pledge made in July 2006 when he said "We will protect robustly the land designated as Green Belt".
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
This petition is against the proposed house building targets for Wimborne Minster and East Dorset which will result in a substatial erosion of the existing Green Belt to allow large-scale high density housing schemes.  

The unique character of the town of Wimborne Minster will be destroyed forever if such development is permitted.  

This petition has been created so that the people of Wimborne Minster can make their views known to the Government.
